solution:
Find the first missing number. What do we multiply 4 by to get 36?


4 ones x 9 = 36 ones
4 x 9 = 36

Now complete the pattern:


4 tens x 9 = 36 tens
40 x 9 = 360

4 hundreds x 9 = 36 hundreds
400 x 9 = 3600

4 thousands x 9 = 36 thousands
4000 x 9 = 36000
